system.note: If wielded by a Weirdboy, counts as Psy Focus, once per encounter when rolling on 'Eadbang Table, may make -30 Willpower Test as Free Action, if suceeded, can choose result and avoid most consequences to themselves. If fail, add +10 to roll. Affected by Kraftsmanship.

description.value:
Special: Primitive (8)

Note: If wielded by a Weirdboy, counts as Psy Focus, once per encounter when rolling on 'Eadbang Table, may make -30 Willpower Test as Free Action, if suceeded, can choose result and avoid most consequences to themselves. If fail, add +10 to roll. Affected by Kraftsmanship.
